text:
Before the match began, many of the spectators
gathered in the stadium thought
this about the hastily arranged hero show.

It was probably something like a ceremony
to welcome the newly debuted rookies
and to expect their future growth.

Otherwise, they wouldn't pit people who,
to an amateur's eye, clearly "should" have
a huge difference in skill against each other.
However-

name: MC
text:
Whoa-o-o-o-o-oh!?
W-what is this!?
What in the world is happening!?

name: MC
text:
Hopper the Face and
Zap the Justice,
both are down-!!

name: Audience
text:
No way!?
Even if they have a numerical advantage,
aren't those guys rookies!?

name: Audience
text:
I thought it was a casual, fan-service-focused show,
but they actually showed us such a heated and serious battle.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
That hero Rokusei,
wasn't he the one who blew off
his event suit in front of us!?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
That's right, I remember!
And the two next to them were
customers watching then... Were they heroes?

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
No, I think they awakened
during their stay at Hero Festa.
I was asked by those two how to become a hero.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Well, I had already noticed
the boys' hidden potential at that time,
heh heh!

name: Canes
text:
Haa... we did it,
we defeated Justice...!

name: Sterio
text:
Hee... I'm happy, but
I can't move anymore...!

name: Rokusei
text:
Sterio-kun... and also,
this old man's age...
Jeez, I wish you'd consider that too...!

The rookies each mutter, barely able to stand,
and look at their opponents lying on the floor.

Praying that they would stay down
and never get up.

name: Justice
text: -Hah-hah-hah-hah!!

name: Rokusei, Canes & Sterio
text: Gah! He's up!!

A clear voice, showing no signs of fatigue.
Justice sits up with a jolt
and smiles broadly at the camera.

options.text: As expected of an S-rank hero...

name: Justice
text:
Whoa, whoa, no need to brace yourselves, rookies!
We have well understood your skills, indeed!!

name: Justice
text:
If we continue this, it might become a battle
that transcends the hero show!
Hahahahahahaha!!!!

Even though he had sustained enough damage to break his suit,
Ryekie laughs with the same vigor as before the match.

Huckle leans on his partner's shoulder and stands up.
Though he looks more exhausted than his partner,
he still has enough energy in himself to smile.

name: Hopper
text:
Hehe, that's right...
It's probably better to end the match
before we get too carried away.

With both sides completely exhausted and
unable to continue the match, resulting in a draw,
which the MC announces as befitting a hero show.

name: MC
text:
Honoring the valiant efforts of both sides,
the special hero show
is now concluded-!

name: MC
text:
A huge round of applause
for the heroes who showed us their
ultimate power in this stadium-!!!!

Deafening applause and cheers
fill the stadium.

Ryekie and Huckle, supporting each other,
slowly walk towards the rookies
across the confetti-filled field.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Justice
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha! Don't say that!!
It would be rude to hold back just because they're rookies!!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hopper
dialogue_after_selection.text: If anything, I was so engrossed in the battle with you all that I couldn't even think of holding back, hahaha.

name: Justice
text:
But I'm surprised!
To be able to fight us like this,
you truly have great skill!!

name: Hopper
text:
Beyond individual strength,
the teamwork of the three of you...
No, with the Operator as well, is truly wonderful.

name: Hopper
text:
I saw your "true resolve" with my own eyes,
and experienced it.
Thank you very much.

Huckle thanks the boys, and
Rokusei, who proposed this hero show.

name: Canes
text:
Thank you too.
I-I will never forget this precious opportunity
you gave me.

name: Sterio
text:
Me too, me too!
I'll remember today's memories forever.
I'll treasure them~!

The heroes praise each other's efforts
and exchange handshakes and warm hugs.
The cheers filling the venue grow even louder.

Finale:
The Friendship of Guan and Bao

note:
The raw title is 管鮑の交わり (Kanbou no Majiwari),
an idiom meaning an extremely close and trusting friendship,
often one that transcends personal gain and/or conflicts.

It started with an idiom and ended with an idiom, isn't that fun?

text:
Some time after the
gripping hero show ended-

name: Rakta
text:
Well, I'm surprised.
I never thought I'd see your faces
two days in a row.

name: Rakta
text:
It's good that you have healthy bodies
that you can afford to be so mischievous,
but please take care of yourselves.

name: Rakta
text:
...Well, I should say that, just in case.
I watched the hero show broadcast.
It was a truly wonderful battle!

Canes and Sterio,
who received treatment in the infirmary,
were lying side by side on adjacent beds.

Rokusei, perhaps in good condition,
was sitting on a chair next to their bed,
accompanying them.

name: Loren
text:
It was truly amazing~!
I only watched the broadcast from halfway through
because of work, but it was a really thrilling battle!

name: Loren
text:
Oh, I really wish I could have watched
such an amazing hero show at the stadium.
...You think so too, don't you~?

Loren praises the boys,
then looks towards the other side of the curtain
and speaks with a slightly thorny tone.

A faint silhouette is visible,
not responding and not moving a muscle.
-Until Loren opens the curtain.

name: Loren
text:
Excuse me.
How are you feeling?

name: Genji
text:
...!
Don't open the curtain
at this timing, you idiot!

name: Canes
text:
Oh, Genji-san!?
Why are you here...
Did you get injured in yesterday's battle, or-

name: Genji
text:
It's not like that.
I told him I was fine, but that nurse
just brought me here on his own.

name: Loren
text:
What are you talking about!!
You were standing captivated in front
of the main area's broadcast screen-

name: Loren
text:
And you didn't even drink water in this scorching heat,
that's practically suicide!
As a medical professional, I can't overlook that!

name: Genji
text:
Oh, you're exaggerating!
I've been a construction worker for many years,
I'm used to this much heat!

name: Rakta
text:
Yes, familiarity is terrifying,
and people often don't notice
when their bodies are in distress.

name: Loren
text:
Professor's right.
Genji-san, I think your endurance is amazing, but...
please take care of your body properly.

Loren, unusually assertive, speaks to the patient
who stubbornly refuses to admit he's unwell,
and Rakta joins in.

Just as their small arguments
were about to escalate into a quarrel,
the three people in the same room interjected.

name: Rokusei
text:
Could it be... that you watched
Canes-kun and Sterio-kun's battle the whole time
until you were affected by the heat?

name: Canes
text:
Eh!?
Um, sorry... no,
thank you, maybe?

name: Sterio
text:
Gen-jiji, you don't like hospitals?
You can come next to me,
you won't be scared if we're together!

A familiar face appeared on the live broadcast
of the special hero show he saw passing by.

He had thought he would at least cheer a little
for the boys and the other rookie's
performance, but-

Before he knew it, he was captivated by their utterly serious battle,
and Genji became unable to move
from in front of the screen.

Though he had hidden his extremely embarrassing
predicament, it was easily seen through by Rokusei,
and Genji is greatly agitated.

Furthermore, being treated like a child by Sterio,
who doesn't understand the situation,
he becomes speechless.

name: Loren
text:
Sterio-kun, you are really kind, thank you~!
Next time Genji-san refuses treatment,
maybe I'll ask you to do it?

name: Genji
text:
Shut up!!
You guys watch the match,
I'm going back to sleep!

Genji, his face flushed for a reason other than heat,
forcefully closes the curtain.

Rakta and Loren smile wryly, but at the same time,
they breathe a sigh of relief
to confirm that all patients are steadily recovering.

name: Rakta
text:
Now, Loren-kun and I will step out for a moment.
When we return, everyone
should be good to leave here.

name: Loren
text:
Until then, please continue to rest.
Please, take care.

Seeing the two leaving the infirmary,
Rokusei and the others watch the broadcast
on the room's screen.

It was in the middle of an exhibition battle
between the originally scheduled winning team
against Ryekie and Huckle.

name: Rokusei
text:
Whoa... seriously...
Aren't those two basically monsters?
It's a continuous battle, even with a break.

name: Rokusei
text:
It's true that [Player]-kun,
who is operating, is also amazing,
but veteran heroes are also incredible~

Rokusei speaks to the boys
while watching the match in a relaxed manner.

name: Canes
text:
They're truly amazing...
Their strength and stamina are one thing, but I felt
their seriousness towards fighting was completely different.

name: Canes
text:
It's late to say this, but we are
incredibly lucky, aren't we?
To meet such amazing people-

name: Canes
text:
Not only to talk to them, but
to fight with them, and to learn
various things from them...

name: Sterio
text:
Lots of food too~,
everyone treated me~,
I'm super lucky!

name: Canes
text:
Is it always about food with you!?
That's fine, but
there were other important things, right?

Sterio agrees without tilting his head
at Canes's exasperated words.
He recalls the faces of the adults one by one.

name: Sterio
text:
Oh, right, right!
[Player] made me a hero!
Gen-jiji saved Canes!

name: Sterio
text:
Rokusei, Pubraseer,
you taught me how to make up...
Oh no, I was fighting with Canes!?

name: Rokusei
text:
Ahahahahaha! Did you forget?
Well, that must mean Sterio-kun's
worries have lightened.

name: Rokusei
text:
Besides, so many things happened one
after another just a moment ago,
that there was no time to fight.

name: Canes
text:
That was more like me pouting...
Ugh, remembering it makes me embarrassed.

Even though it was an action born of desperation,
for Canes, who is now calm,
it was an event he didn't want to touch upon.

name: Canes
text:
But I don't want to leave it ambiguous.
Because it's about my precious family.

name: Canes
text:
Give me time when we get home, Sterio.
I want to talk to you properly about
everything that's happened, and everything that will happen.

name: Sterio
text:
Of course~!
But, but, when we get back from outside, wash our hands and gargle,
and report to Papa and Mama first!

Rokusei smiles, influenced by the two siblings
of different species,
who are laughing brightly.

name: Rokusei
text:
Since you're already here,
might as well get some souvenirs for your parents!
You two are here until the final day, right?

Those words expressed the intention that he wanted them to
enjoy the representative festival of Orient City
without reservation from now on.

However, Rokusei's statement
served as a catalyst, and Canes
confirms something with him.

name: Canes
text:
Before we go home, just one question.
Rokusei-san, you're not actually
a rookie hero, are you?

name: Canes
text:
Rokusei-san,
your teamwork with [Player]-san is perfect,
just like veteran hunters!

name: Canes
text:
Also, while Sterio and I are exhausted,
Rokusei-san, you still seems to have energy,
and you don't look like you're faking it either.

Hiding even his surprise,
Rokusei closes his mouth
to the boy's question, which is close to the truth.

name: Canes
text:
Sorry for prying.
You've always been kind to us...
But that's why I'm curious.

name: Canes
text:
Please tell me, Rokusei-san.
Who exactly are you,
who has been with us all this time?

name: Akashi, Mokdai & Sui
text: Good work, everyone!!

Some time passed, and [Player],
having finished the exhibition battle,
returned to the dressing room with Ryekie and Huckle.

Everyone from Parallel Flight Inc.
was gathered in the same room, welcoming the exhausted fighters
who had just finished intense consecutive battles.

name: Akashi
text:
You three are being too reckless!?
After such a serious battle in a hero show,
you fought the winning team too!

name: Huckle
text:
Well, Akashi-kun is right.
Moving this much will surely
affect us tomorrow, ouch, ouch...

name: Ryekie
text:
However, the audience was more excited
than ever before!
It was worth the recklessness!! Hahah!

name: Sui
text:
Shouldn't we cancel all of President Huckle's
appointments for tomorrow right now-
Mokdai?

There's no reply from the person she spoke to.
Sui looks at Mokdai suspiciously,
and he is smiling, shedding tears like a waterfall.

name: Mokdai
text:
The best... I think Orient City
should establish a new holiday
to commemorate this day...!

name: Mokdai
text:
The legends' techniques, not diminished but sharpened!
The rookies' fighting style, raw but brilliant!

name: Mokdai
text:
The battle with the winning team was too heated...
Ugh, I've never wanted to be a battle stage
as much as I do today!!

name: Crowne
text:
Ahahahaha, that's hilarious!
If you fought on your stomach,
it wouldn't be a proper battle!

Mokdai says incoherent things out of emotion,
while Crowne laughs imagining it,
a can of beer in her hand.

name: Melide
text:
Alcohol...
Maybe I should stop her soon.
Or should I give her water first?

name: Monomasa
text:
You need neither of those, Melide.
We need to get away from
Crowne as fast as possible.

Members who were on summer vacation
also visited Hero Festa today,
and appeared backstage with Akashi and the others.

name: Yoshiori
text:
The president is battered, and his subordinates are drunk...
You guys, you're really enjoying
the festival to the fullest, aren't you?

name: Exio
text:
Hehe, if you've been living a life of constant tension,
it's natural to want to let loose.
...Though for Crowne-kun, it seems like everyday life.

name: Akashi
text:
Everyday life, huh... When Hero Festa
ends, it's back to school and
part-time work every day.

Akashi speaks deeply,
as if reminiscing about the life
he lived just a week ago.

name: Mokdai
text:
For me, it's every day of adjusting equipment
and dedicating myself to sales activities,
while preparing for the appearance of monsters and villains.

name: Sui
text:
I like those days too.
They don't have the glamour of a festival,
but I can focus on things calmly.

name: Huckle
text:
Hehe, it's fine to reminisce about everyday life,
but please continue to manage the food stall
until Hero Festa ends, you guys.

name: Huckle
text:
By the way, [Player],
your plan to meet up with Rokusei-kun
later is still on, right?

options.text: Just received a message inviting me...

name: Huckle
text:
Tell Rokusei-kun good work.
Also, I'd like to ask you
to deliver one more message, if you don't mind?

[Player] reads the message
that just arrived from the person mentioned,
and heads to the designated meeting place.

It was the warehouse at the edge of the venue,
where they had secretly conversed with Huckle
on the day the Festa began-

name: Seiichiro
text: -Are you an idiot?

The moment [Player] arrived,
Seiichiro immediately snaps at the person
who "used to be" a "rookie hero."

name: Seiichiro
text:
Even though your hero form is almost unknown,
you're in charge of greetings?
Participating in a hero show? Are you an idiot?

name: Seiichiro
text:
I highly doubt you're expecting
me to pull strings from behind
the scenes to cover for you...

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Ehhh~ aren't you going to cover for me?
If I mess up, it'll eventually
cause trouble for you too!

name: Seiichiro
text:
What nonsense are you spouting?
Do you think I'd be gentle
just because [Player] is here?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
So you're aware you're changing your attitude...
No, no, I didn't say anything.
I'm truly sorry-!!

Tsuneaki replies to Seiichiro,
who is criticizing him,
showing no sign of remorse.

options.text: Are you two not getting along?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text: I want to get along, but this Mr. Bureaucrat's replies are somehow so dull~?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Seiichiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I intend to converse sincerely, but now?
Before you comment on me, why don't you reflect on your own suspicious behavior?

options.text: Is it the 'fight so much you get along' type?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa- [Player]-kun!
Stop saying things like that~
We're not getting along at all!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Seiichiro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In the first place, it's not even a fight.
I'm just having a proper conversation, not humoring this man's irresponsible remarks.

options.text: From Kyoto and Osaka... I see.

text:
They never coordinate their breathing,
and both deny [Player]'s words in their own way.

Then Tsuneaki brings the
sidetracked conversation back on track.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I couldn't avoid showing my face.
There were various miscalculations,
and so I had to act like a rookie.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Yes, speaking of miscalculations, that suit!
I didn't think it would be so fragile;
my sunglasses were shattered in an instant!

name: Tsuneaki
text:
As a rookie, I couldn't tell a big company's
city-wide event not to film, so
it was really troublesome, you know?

options.text: Just now, the president told me-

text:
To Tsuneaki, who looks truly troubled,
[Player] relayed the words
they had just been entrusted with.

name: Huckle
text:
Regarding the hero show, I asked the management
headquarters to broadcast it live only,
with no recording allowed.

name: Huckle
text:
Canes-kun and Sterio-kun just awakened.
At that point, we hadn't obtained their consent
for recording as heroes.

name: Huckle
text:
Also, just in case, I also told them
to avoid showing Rokusei-kun as much as possible,
or to film him from angles where his face is hard to distinguish.

name: Huckle
text:
After all,
he proposed the hero show himself,
so we can't cause him trouble.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I-I'm saved-!!
This old man owes President Huckle a lot!

name: Seiichiro
text:
Wait- The surprise hero show
that was held today,
did you propose that!?

name: Seiichiro
text:
What do you mean, miscalculation?
You're creating opportunities for
yourself to be exposed!

[Player] and Tsuneaki briefly explain
the events at Hero Festa to Seiichiro.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
-As a member of the Defense Bureau,
I have a duty. And personally, I have
a wish I want to fulfill more than anything.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
On top of that, as a fledgling hero,
I absolutely wanted to help them
seize their dream.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
And I was prepared to be reprimanded and punished
for letting my personal feelings interfere.

name: Seiichiro
text:
...Despite that, Tsuneaki.
Your fluster just now
was unbearable to watch.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
That's that, and this is this, right!?
No matter how prepared I am,
I don't want to be punished, you know?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
So truly, President Huckle's preparations really helped.
I can't even sleep with my feet facing him anymore!

Just when he seemed to reveal his true face from behind the mask,
he immediately hides his true feelings with a playful demeanor.

Seiichiro feels that he's still a cunning person,
but also probably the most human among them.

He never says that he might be quite similar to himself,
and speaks to him in his usual condescending tone.

name: Seiichiro
text:
It can't be helped... Just this once,
I'll do my best to help you clean up
the mess you made.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Eh, I couldn't ask for more,
but are you really sure!?

name: Seiichiro
text:
Hmph, don't underestimate the Vice Minister of Public Affairs.
Let me tell you, this is a favor.
It'll cost you dearly.

name: Seiichiro
text:
Besides... we, as national public servants,
cannot keep causing trouble
only for a private company like Parallel Flight.

name: Seiichiro
text:
...[Player], it seems you've
been through a lot. Good work.
Don't be too lenient with this man.

Bidding farewell to Seiichiro,
Tsuneaki stands in the evening light
of the Hero Festa venue.

options.text: It was a chaotic festival in many ways.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Oh, do you think everything is over
already, [Player]-kun?
There's still the final day, you know?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Well, the hero greetings
finished early, so our work
is done for now.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
There were some tense moments, but
gaining a connection with President Huckle
was a good harvest, and the Festa itself was fun.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Yes... it became a very good memory.
It's a little sad to think
it's ending today, though.

options.text: It's not the final day yet.

text:
Tsuneaki nods slightly at [Player]'s words
and replies that he's not good at goodbyes.

name: Rokusei
text:
Even so, I said goodbye to
those siblings earlier.

name: Rokusei
text:
Because Canes-kun seemed
desperate to know who I was-

name: Canes
text:
Please tell me, Rokusei-san.
Who exactly are you,
who has been with us all this time?

name: Rokusei
text:
Sorry, I can't tell you now.
But in return, I'll make
one promise to you.

name: Rokusei
text:
Canes-kun, Sterio-kun.
If you two become full-fledged heroes,
and we meet again-

name: Rokusei
text:
Then, I will answer the question
you just asked truthfully.

name: Rokusei
text:
Until then... I will always remember
you two, and the time we spent together
at this Hero Festa.

name: Sterio
text:
I won't forget Rokusei either,
or the fun times we had.
Forever and ever, absolutely!

name: Canes
text:
…………….
...Understood.
It's a promise, then.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
-After we promised to meet again,
they both fell asleep. While they were sleeping,
I slipped out of the infirmary.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Those siblings are far more dazzling
than the summer sun to me,
and too hot to be near.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Besides... it would be better not to become
any more intimate with them,
given my shadowy existence from now on.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I certainly don't want a situation
where I expose them to danger
when they haven't even decided on their affiliation yet.

options.text: You didn't say you were an actor, did you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even if I tried to gloss over it like that, they'd probably see through it.
Canes-kun is quite sharp, isn't he?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Besides, what the boy wants to know is my identity as a hero.
Well, when the time comes, I'll tell him honestly-

options.text: Do you intend to meet them?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course I do!
You already know I like them, don't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
However, I don't intend to actively show my face in front of them.
Because-

options.text: I see, when you tell the truth-

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Reuniting with me means, nine times out of ten,
they're involved in "something significant".

name: Tsuneaki
text:
...When that happens, I'll surely
do everything I can to help them,
won't I?

options.text: So meeting me was an exception?
Even if you say that in this situation...

name: Tsuneaki
text:
This time was truly a coincidence!
I had meticulously prepared beforehand,
as my main job was on the line, you know?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
But, well...
this old man had his reasons,
and this is how things turned out.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
(I can't say that I tried my best not to see
your personal information so I wouldn't let my
personal feelings interfere, can I!?)

For some reason, Tsuneaki blushed
and refused to elaborate afterwards.

After a moment hesitating,
he quickly changed the subject.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
But you know, thanks to such unexpected things
and coincidences happening,
I got to spend such a wonderful summer with you.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Moreover, you even showed me
the form I might have taken...
I'm truly happy.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Thank you, [Player].
The image of "Rokusei" that you showed me
will remain in my heart forever.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Even if I disappear from the public eye after this moment,
I will cherish it along with the memories of this summer.

With a heartfelt smile,
Tsuneaki extends his dominant
hand to [Player].

options.text: I'm glad I could be of help to you, Tsuneaki-san.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player]-kun, come on.
You know I can't refuse when you ask me, right?

options.text: But I won't let you leave like this.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You know that after our time together, I'd notice your plea, don't you?
You're sly~!

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Oh dear... well, fine.
I'll accompany you on the final day.
It's my way of returning the favor for everything.

Tsuneaki laughs, not entirely displeased.
With a defenseless expression he never
showed anyone when they met in Kyoto.
A few days later, on Muirauka I-

name: Sterio
text:
And then, and then~,
with the tornado I caused, all the pirates
flew away like~ Whoosh!

The boys, having returned to their parents' side,
were taking turns telling them
countless memories.

They had already covered the important topics,
such as both of them awakening as heroes
and how to join an agency.

Now, every time they gather around the dinner table,
Canes and Sterio take turns narrating
the events on Earth.

name: Mother
text:
Well, those were some dangerous guys.
Anyway, I'm glad you two are safe.

name: Canes
text:
The space pirates were more like
festival-lovers, rather, they just
wanted to have fun.

name: Canes
text:
The dangerous ones were the monsters.
A huge one appeared from the sea,
one you hardly ever see on broadcasts-

name: Canes
text:
To evacuate everyone in the sea area,
the heroes from Labor's Site...
Oh, right, I met Goro-san too!

name: Father
text:
What!?
Goro was a hero too?
Then we should have asked him first.

name: Mother
text:
Well, it's fine, isn't it?
Perhaps it's precisely because you went all the way to Earth
and talked to various people that you could become heroes.

With a nod, the boys' father
listens happily to their small adventure story.

name: Canes
text:
You know, I had just awakened as a hero,
and fighting such a huge monster,
I think it was reckless now that I look back.

name: Canes
text:
But Sterio was there,
and the other heroes helped us,
so we all defeated the monster.

name: Father
text:
-Oh!
"Ah, that moment was amazing"!!

name: Sterio
text:
Amazing?
Canes, this is the first time you've talked about this at home.
How come Papa already knew?

name: Mother
text:
He probably meant "That must have been amazing,
wasn't it", he just mispoke.
He always get his words mixed up.

name: Father
text:
Th-that's right!
As expected of my honey,
you understand me so well, don't you?

name: Mother
text:
Don't get carried away!!
-Now, Sterio, Canes.
Tell us the rest some other time.

name: Mother
text:
You two keep talking
even after you finish eating,
so I can't even clean up.

Prompted by their mother, Canes and Sterio
leave the living room and spend their time separately.

name: Father
text:
......
...That was close~

name: Mother
text:
Be careful, dear.
It might not be something to hide,
but still-

name: Father
text:
Hey, hey, hey...
Isn't that Sterio?
He really became a hero!

name: Mother
text:
From his appearance,
it seems Canes didn't succeed.
...Should I go talk to him later?

name: Father
text:
Then there'd be no point in coming here
without them knowing, would there!?
I understand how you feel, but we have to endure.

name: Father
text:
Look at Sterio, he's fighting
like a real hero!
Go, knock them down!!

name: Father
text:
...! Canes!
When did you
notice Sterio's secret!?

name: Mother
text:
Wait, dear...
We, who didn't confess until today,
have no right to comfort that child.

name: Mother
text:
I'm sorry... Sterio, Canes.
Because we lacked courage,
we complicated your sibling relationship.

name: Father
text:
Whoa-o-o-o-o-oh!?
Hey, look, look at the broadcast!
It's a monster extermination live show!!

name: Mother
text:
This is a shelter, keep it down!
What in the world-?
C-Canes!?

name: Mother
text:
-Sneaking into Hero Festa
and watching those children the whole time,
that's pretty creepy, isn't it?

name: Father
text:
But, you know... neither you nor I
could have just waited quietly
at home, could we?

name: Mother
text:
Hey, dear, we can keep this
a secret from the children for now, right?
It's not a bad thing, anyway.

name: Father
text:
Yeah, that's right. When Canes and Sterio
can both handle the family business and hero work,
and grow up to be full-fledged adults-

name: Father
text:
Once we are drinking together,
we'll reveal that we were also
on Earth at that time.

name: Father
text:
They're performing dangerous jobs and
living their lives, so they deserve
to have that much fun.

To put it extremely, tomorrow, they might lose
someone in their family,
or someone in their profession (neighbors).

Precisely because they live in such an environment,
they spend every day to the fullest,
with small joys and wishes in their hearts.

Canes and Sterio are no exception;
the boys who have faced life
will surely live even more vibrantly than before.

name: Canes
text:
Hey Sterio, if we actually start
hero activities, we might sometimes
go to work separately.

name: Sterio
text:
Really? Then, then will it be a
competition to see who hunts the biggest prey?
I won't lose!

name: Canes
text:
There are missions other than monsters extermination, right?
...Anyway, when we're acting separately,
let's tell each other what happened at our respective sites.

name: Canes
text:
Whether together or apart.
Our home is always this "house".

name: Sterio
text:
Woof! I understand!
I'll never, ever
forget my family, anywhere, anytime!

name: Sterio
text:
Speaking of which,
what do we do if our hunting days and
hero missions overlap?

name: Canes
text:
We have to think about that too.
Next time, let's consult Papa and Mama.
Oh, and let's ask Goro-san too!

Until late into the night, Canes and Sterio
talk about their future, dreaming of their
future selves as full-fledged adults, and fall asleep.

Inside the house, where their parents have also gone to bed.
A digital device is left in the living room,
perhaps forgotten by someone.

On the screen, two applications
for affiliation with Labor's Site are displayed.

Live A Hero! Special Edition
"Rookies Summer Festa"
―END
